forum.content:
最終版來啦
期待老阿諾打新阿諾

而且還有Khaleesi as Sara Connor

憲哥演液態金屬人
爽片中的爽片啊！！

urls.description:

Terminator Genisys. In cinemas July 2015. Starring Arnold Schwarzenegge
